SlideShow.heading: Project Paramour
SlideShow.text: Project made for an art museum near Southwest London. Project Paramour is a statement of bold, modern architecture.

SlideShow.heading: Seraph Station
SlideShow.text: The Seraph Station project challenged us to design a unique station that would transport people through time. The result is a fresh and futuristic model inspired by space stations.

SlideShow.heading: Federal II Tower
SlideShow.text: A sequel theme project for a tower originally built in the 1800s. We achieved this with a striking look of brutal minimalism with modern touches.

SlideShow.heading: Trinity Bank Tower
SlideShow.text: Trinity Bank challenged us to make a concept for a 84 story building located in the middle of a city with a high earthquake frequency. For this project we used curves to blend design and stability to meet our objectives.
